definition: as the proverb says/as they say...
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: As the saying goes, the devil often appears in the subtle.
sentences.chinese: 俗話說，魔鬼常出現在細微處。

sentences.english: Kate: As the saying goes,"Interest is the best teacher."Right?
sentences.chinese: 俗話說得好，興趣是最好的老師，對吧？

sentences.english: An old saying goes that a near neighbor is better than a distant cousin. Having a good neighbor is lucky.
sentences.chinese: 俗話說“遠親不如近鄰”，有個好鄰居是件幸運的事。

sentences.english: As the saying is "Male afraid the wrong line, female afraid married the wrong lang".
sentences.chinese: 俗話說“男怕入錯行，女怕嫁錯郎”。

sentences.english: As the saying goes, there is honour among thieves.
As the saying goes, taking money, especially disaster.
sentences.chinese: 俗話說，拿人錢財，替人消災。

sentences.english: As the saying goes, “A fall into the pit, a gain in your wit.”
As the saying goes, "those are not high, no long-life air-chi."
sentences.chinese: 俗話說得好，“有志不在年高，無志空長百歲。”

sentences.english: The fatherland is our family, but now many students abroad cannot go back.
sentences.chinese: 俗話說祖國是家，如今有家卻不能回。

sentences.english: In fact, non-verbal communication can, as the saying goes, speak volumes.
sentences.chinese: 事實非言語交際，正如俗話說，此時無聲勝有聲。

sentences.english: People say that the only naturally air-conditioned place in summer is a big cave.
sentences.chinese: 俗話說大大的洞穴是夏天裏唯一的天然空調房。

sentences.english: We have the saw to the effect that many a true word is spoken in jest.
sentences.chinese: 俗話說的好，許多真相都是開着玩笑說出來的。

sentences.english: As the saying goes well, to stay in the Castle Peak, not afraid of firewood.
sentences.chinese: 俗話說得好，留在青山在，不怕沒柴燒。

sentences.english: As the saying goes, wives have to find a woman Chaoshan.
sentences.chinese: 俗話說，找老婆就要找潮汕女人。

sentences.english: There is a saying that the common people are too clever to be fooled by crooks.
sentences.chinese: 俗話說的好，老百姓太聰明而被騙子愚弄。

sentences.english: Common saying says, "Jie Ling fastens a bell to enter even " .
sentences.chinese: 俗話說，“解鈴還要系鈴入”。
